main event: An airman sighted a round, reddish object emitting spurts of thin gas over Elmendorf Air Force Base in Alaska.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately 15 minutes,The object was observed traveling in a southeasterly direction,The visibility was poor due to light snow and rain,The object emitted short spurts of thin gas at intervals,The conclusion of the report suggested the object was unidentified, with possibilities including balloon, aircraft, or astronomical origin.
witness description: Airman Second Class John E Driscoll
